question: In which one of the following nations "Sixty Dome Mosque", a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is located?
explanation: Sixty Dome Mosque is also known as Shait Gambuj Mosque. It is a part of the Mosque City of Bagerhat, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It was built during the Bengal Sultanate by Ulugh Khan Jahar. It is a form of Tughlaq style of architecture.
